Package com.tailf.ncs.template

Class Template

Object
com.tailf.ncs.template.Template
public class Template extends Object
Template represents an NCS template, that is a template loaded from the directory templates of the package.

  • Constructor Details

    • Template

      public Template(ServiceContext aServiceContext, String aTemplateName) throws ConfException
      Construct a Template. Note that the template has to have already been loaded by NCS, otherwise an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      aServiceContext - the context is which this call is made.
      aTemplateName - name of the template.
      Throws:
      ConfException

      public static Set<String> getTemplates(ServiceContext aServiceContext) throws ConfException
      Returns a set consisting of the loaded templates.
      Parameters:
      aServiceContext - the context in which this call is made.
      Returns:
      Set of loaded templates.

    • exists

      public static boolean exists(ServiceContext context, String template) throws ConfException
      Tests for existence of a template.
      Parameters:
      context - the context in which this call is made.
      template - name of the template.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on whether the template is loaded or not.
      Throws:
      ConfException

    • apply

      public void apply(NavuNode root, TemplateVariables variables) throws ConfException
      Apply a template in the specified context
      Parameters:
      root - the initial context and root context for evaluation of XPath expressions
      variables - a set of key value pairs where each key will be an XPath variable.
      Throws:
      ConfException

    • apply

      public void apply(Maapi maapi, int tid, ConfPath rootPath, TemplateVariables variables) throws ConfException
      Apply a template in the specified context
      Parameters:
      maapi - a maapi connection to the NCS server
      tid - a transaction id which should be attached to the maapi connection
      rootPath - the initial context and root context for evaluation of XPath expressions
      variables - a set of key value pairs where each key will be an XPath variable.
      Throws:
      ConfException
